description: Source file implementing authentication-related services such as login, registration, token management, and user profile operations for a web application.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class that provides methods for user authentication, registration, token refresh, profile management, and permission checks.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user using credentials and sets tokens upon success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user account with provided data.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and clears stored tokens and user data.

methods.name: refreshToken
methods.description: Refreshes the authentication token using the stored refresh token.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Updates the current user's profile data.

methods.name: forgotPassword
methods.description: Initiates password reset process via email.

methods.name: resetPassword
methods.description: Resets password using a reset token.

methods.name: verifyEmail
methods.description: Verifies a user's email address using a token.

methods.name: getStoredUser
methods.description: Retrieves user data stored in local storage.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if the user is currently authenticated.

methods.name: hasPermission
methods.description: Checks if the current user has a specific permission.

methods.name: hasRole
methods.description: Checks if the current user has a specific role.

methods.name: hasAnyRole
methods.description: Checks if the user has any of the provided roles.
